full_summary:
======================================

**Title**
---------

**English**: ESAP District Energy Systems Advisory Services
**French**: Services consultatifs pour les Systèmes d'Énergie de Quartier (SEQ) du Programme d'Acquisition de Services Énergétiques (PASE)

**Reference Number**
------------------

WS4465247633-Doc4465710840

**Brief Description**
-------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking advisory services in support of the modernization and expansion of district energy systems under the Energy Services Acquisition Program (ESAP). The services will be required on an as-and-when-requested basis.

**Key Information**
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4465247633
* **Publication Date**: February 29, 2024
* ** Tender Closing Date**: March 18, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT
* **Contract Term**: Three (3) years with three (3) one-year options to extend
* **Contract Award**: It is anticipated that one (1) contract will be awarded

**Technical Requirements**
-----------------------

Applicants must have expertise in district energy systems modernization and expansion.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contracting Authority**
---------------------

The contracting authority for this procurement is:

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For inquiries, please contact:

* Benoit Fournel-Trepanier, PSPC
* Email: [benoit.fournel-trepanier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:benoit.fourn
